# Consulting
Arbor Custom Analytics LLC offers data and analytics consulting services to all sized organizations in the forest products industry. 

## Specializations include
* Forest analytics
* Timberland resource assessment
* Data management
* Forest growth and yield modeling
* Statistical modeling
* Machine learning
* Teaching data concepts to forest and natural resource professionals
* Leveraging existing data to solve new problems
* Independent research
